documents.document: "If you don't drive your business, you will be driven out of business. - B. C. Forbes"
"Leap, and the net will appear. - John Burroughs "
"If you're going through hell, keep going. - Winston Churchill"
Never fear shadows.... that always means there is a light shining somewhere. - Jonathan Santos
Make measurable progress in reasonable time. - Jim Rohn
Money grows on the tree of patience - Proverb
"Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops. - Thomas J. Watson"
Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success. - Henry Ford
The main thing is to keep the main thing the main thing. - Stephen Covey
"Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect. - Mark Twain"
"The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph. - Thomas Paine"
"If you have to forecast, forecast often. - Edgar R. Fiedler"
Take time to gather up the past so that you will be able to draw from your experience and invest them in the future. - Jim Rohn
Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader. - Tacitus
Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality. - Les Brown
"Before everything else, getting ready is the secret of success. - Henry Ford"
"In the last analysis, what we are communicates far more eloquently than anything we say or do. - Stephen Covey "

"Go where you�re celebrated, not where you�re tolerated."
Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune. - Jim Rohn
I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill. - Edward Appleton
"If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary. - Jim Rohn"
Either you run the day or the day runs you. - Jim Rohn
Don't let someone else's opinion of you become your reality. - Les Brown
The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future. - Philip Emeagwali
In fair weather prepare for foul. - Thomas Fuller
Mankind is made great or little by its own will. - Friedrich Schiller
"The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities. - Stephen Covey "
I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill. - Edward Appleton
Attitudes are contagious. Make yours worth catching.- Unknown
"Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day. - Jim Rohn"
Are you pursuing your dreams? Looking for other options? DM us we can help!
"Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently. - Henry Ford"
Real riches are the riches possessed inside. - B. C. Forbes
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light. - Aristotle Onassis
"You have to think anyway, so why not think big? - Donald Trump"
Family farms and small businesses are the backbone of our communities. - Tom Allen
"When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it. - Jim Rohn"
In fair weather prepare for foul. - Thomas Fuller
Whatever good things we build end up building us. - Jim Rohn
"He who asks is a fool for five minutes, but he who does not ask remains a fool forever.�Chinese Proverb"
Being defeated is only a temporary condition; giving up is what makes it permanent.- Marilyn vos Savant
"Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing. - Vince Lombardi"
Most of the important things have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed 2 be no hope at all.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.- Goethe
"The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity. - Peter Drucker"
"Remember that happiness is a way of travel, not a destination.- Roy Goodman"
The best way out is always through. - Robert Frost
"To succeed, one must be creative and persistent. - John H. Johnson"
"Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something. - Thomas A. Edison"
Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority. - William Arthur Ward
Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed. - Peter Drucker
"Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the ""gotta have it"" scale. - Zig Ziglar "
"In the last analysis, what we are communicates far more eloquently than anything we say or do. - Stephen Covey "
We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment. - Jim Rohn
Comfort is the enemy of achievement.
An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today. - Laurence J. Peter
Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune. - Jim Rohn
"Without a sense of urgency, desire loses its value. - Jim Rohn"
With self-discipline most anything is possible. - Theodore Roosevelt
"Out of clutter, find Simplicity. From discord, find Harmony. In the middle of difficulty lies Opportunity.�Albert Einstein"

Belief creates the actual fact. - William James
Bargain... anything a customer thinks a store is losing money on. - Kin Hubbard
"Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day. - Jim Rohn"
Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected. - Steve Jobs
Part of your heritage in this society is the opportunity to become financially independent. - Jim Rohn
Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success. - Henry Ford
You miss 100% of the shots you don�t take.�Wayne Gretzky
"Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.�Winston Churchill"
"Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something. - Thomas A. Edison"
"Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition, everything else is secondary.�Steve Jobs"

Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it. - Elbert Hubbard
"If you have to forecast, forecast often. - Edgar R. Fiedler"
Nothing so conclusively proves a man's ability to lead others as what he does from day to day to lead himself. - Thomas J. Watson
Life begins where your comfort zone ends.
Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet. - Robert H. Schuller
Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become. - Jim Rohn
Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed. - Peter Drucker
"Profit in business comes from repeat customers, and bring friends with them. - W. Edwards Deming"
Today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday - Proverb
"Business is never so healthy as when, like a chicken, it must do a certain amount of scratching around for what it gets. - Henry Ford"
You're only as good as the people you hire. - Ray Kroc
Young people don't know what age is, and old people forget what youth was. - Proverb
An advertising agency is 85 percent confusion and 15 percent commission. - Fred Allen
The journey is the reward. - Chinese Proverb
All lasting business is built on friendship. - Alfred A. Montapert
Goals help you channel your energy into action. - Les Brown
Those who wish to sing always find a song. - Proverb
"If you can dream it, you can do it. - Walt Disney"
I rate enthusiasm even above professional skill. - Edward Appleton
We don't have a monopoly. We have market share. There's a difference. - Steve Ballmer
"Hell, there are no rules here - we're trying to accomplish something. - Thomas A. Edison"
"It is not what we get. But who we become, what we contribute... that gives meaning to our lives. - Tony Robins"
Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion. - Jim Rohn
The dog that trots about finds a bone. - Golda Meir
"You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight. - Jim Rohn"
Act or accept.- Anonymous
Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes. - Zig Ziglar
